summary.para: Gets the file name extension for the shortcut object.

param.name: pszExtension
param.para: Pointer to a string that receives the extension.

param.name: cchExtension
param.para: The size of the buffer at pszExtension, in characters.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the folder name for the shortcut object.

param.name: pszFolder
param.para: The address of a character buffer that receives the folder name.

param.name: cchFolder
param.para: The size of the buffer at pszFolder, in characters.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
Returns S_OK if successful, S_FALSE if no folder has been assigned, or a standard error code otherwise.

summary.para: Gets the file name of the shortcut object, without the extension.

param.name: pszName
param.para: A pointer to a string that receives the name.

param.name: cchName
param.para: The size of the buffer at pszName, in characters.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the referent of the shortcut object.

param.name: pszReferent
param.para: A pointer to a string that receives the referent.

param.name: cchReferent
param.para: The size of the buffer at pszReferent, in characters.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: For Internet shortcut objects, this method is the same as IUniformResourceLocator.GetURL.

summary.para: Sets the folder name for the shortcut object.

param.name: pcszFolder
param.para: A pointer to a string that contains the folder name.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the referent of the shortcut object.

param.name: hWnd
param.para: A handle to the window that will be used as the parent if the object needs to display a message box or dialog box. This value can be NULL.
A pointer to a string that contains the referent.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: For Internet shortcut objects, this method is the same as IUniformResourceLocator.SetURL.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: For Internet shortcut objects, this method is the same as IUniformResourceLocator.SetURL.
